attributes.additional_details:
To have all schools nut free. So students can learn in an environment that is not a danger to them and so they have the opportunity to enjoy school like all children should get the chance to do without living in constant fear

Classrooms and class activities to be peanut/tree nut free as well and for birthdays or class celebrations to be food free

classes should be free of risk because children with life threatening allergies can go into anaphylaxis from minimal exposure, some even have severe/deadly reactions from touch
